problem: GOOOOBAHis being proposed and there is not a VDOT IS-1 detail on the plans
comment: <textarea rows="3" cols="75" id="c1" name="c1">All storm structures (drop inlets, catch basins, and manholes, etc.) shall have full diameter invert shaping in accordance with VDOT Standard IS-1.</textarea>

problem: There are pipes that do not meet the minimum 0.3% slope
comment: <textarea rows="3" cols="75" id="c2" name="c1">The minimum and maximum pipe slopes required by the VDOT DM shall be used. Ensure that all pipes are at a minimum of 0.3%</textarea>
